text: Aur (yaqoob alh-e-salam) ney kaha aey meray bacho! Tum sab aik darwazay say na jana bulkay kaee juda juda darwazon mein say dakhil hona. Mein Allah ki taraf say aaney wali kissi cheez ko tum say nahi taal sakta. Hukum sirf Allah hi ka chalta hai. Mera kaamil bharosa ussi per hai aur her aik bharosa kerney walay ko ussi per bharosa kerna chahaiye
